column4: hey guys...  what's the deal with the GUI on this new ubuntu package?  the launcher bar and non-nautilus file managment,  and such.
any tips on where i can find out about changing those aspects of my system?
oh,  gals, too,  i suppose...  lol
uhm, the *current* version of Ubuntu, Maverick, still uses Nautilus and GNOME Panel and everything
